pages.text: Together with $(l:creatures/mog)Mog$(/l), they're a couple of god-like creatures worshipped by $(l:creatures/hobgoblin)Hobgoblins$(/l).

They may send their avatars to pay witches a visit who exploit their worship with a $(l:artifacts/statues/hobgoblin_patron)Statue of Hobgoblin Patron$(/l). Rumor has it that using a $(item)Nether Star$() may make them take immediate notice.$(p)The avatars of Mog and Gulg should not be left close to one another! $(l:artifacts/clothing/gulgs_gurdle)Gulg's Gurdle$(/l) and $(l:artifacts/clothing/mogs_quiver)Mog's Quiver$(/l) are rumored to be powerful artifacts.
